actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: To prohibit former Members of the House of Representatives and the Senate who have been convicted of a felony from lobbying in the legislative or executive branch of the Federal Government.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Regulation of Lobbying Act to prohibit a former Member of Congress who has been convicted of a Federal or State felony from engaging in lobbying activities with Members of Congress or officers or employees in the executive or legislative branch. Specifies penalties.

titles.title: To prohibit former Members of the House of Representatives and the Senate who have been convicted of a felony from lobbying in the legislative or executive branch of the Federal Government.
